column6: Clearly, plan 2 is the best since wind energy is very environmentally friendly. It doesn’t emit any greenhouse gasses and has low startup cost as well.
Hey Sree, can you elaborate on the reason you chose plan 2 from your perspective of what would be most environmentally friendly and with lowest startup costs ?
Clearly, plan 2 is the best since wind energy is very environmentally friendly. It doesn’t emit any greenhouse gasses and has low startup cost as well.
